name: Hunter Mini Demo "The Beginning"
description:
BREAKING NEW:

Try my last game MORTAL RACER on itch.io by clicking on the link below

https://choloco.itch.io/mortal-racer

-------------------------------------------------------

Just to try if the game runs on your computer and if your pad is supported
(plug it before to run the game)
If you don't have pad, the keyboard is available too.

Warning : you can start to shoot (Fire or Ctrl if keyboard) only when you go out of the first house.

You can try too my other game Dogolrax (an Another world/Out of this world clone):

http://store.steampowered.com/app/599960/Dogolrax/
